item.title: Hello Docker - my docker notes
item.description: Docker as the website homepage says is the worldâ€™s leading software containerization platform. Dockers and container tech has become a common practise in the software development. I tried it and fell in love with this for many reasons. The prime reason is it is an open-source project. Long hail opensource developers. So I’ve experimenting on the scenrios in which i might need to use docker containers. I mostly work with Django, but the technical stack varies from simple Django + sqlite to Django + postgres + redis + celery and more.
